title: College Girl & Boy Makeover
description: College Girl & Boy Makeover is a teen fashion game where you style high school students as either a couple or best friends. Create unique looks, from uniforms to first-date outfits, and experiment with hairstyles, accessories, tattoos, and piercings. Share your stylish creations and strive to make this duo the most fashionable at school. Get ready to unleash your inner fashionista in this offline high school dress-up adventure!
